articles.description: The launch of Microsoft’s AI chatbot Bing has captivated users. But too many people believe the bot could be sentient when it only reflects our language back to us. Believing in chatbot sentience is failing the AI mirror test.

AI chatbots like Bing and ChatGPT are entrancing users, but theyre just autocomplete systems trained on our own stories about superintelligent AI. That makes them software not sentient.
